title: Crash Bandicoot’s 25th Anniversary - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.09.21
description:
Greg and Tim talk about last minute PlayStation Showcase predictions, Crash's birthday, and if the Matrix movies are good or bad.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Remember, there’s a PlayStation Showcase THURSDAY at 1 pm PT, and we’ll be reacting LIVE to it on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Last Second PlayStation Showcase Prediction:
00:06:00 - Is this going to be a big presentation or will it just be an average one? - Best Friends Q:Ignacio Rojas
The Roper Report   -
00:16:45 - Devs Celebrate Crash Bandicoot’s 25th Anniversary With Video & Possible Tease, Giuseppe Nelva
00:21:35 - What do you think is something Crash did well that Mario and Sonic didn't in their 3D outings at the time? - Best Friends Q:KBABZ
00:39:00 -  Ad
00:29:25 - Bugsnax Devs Move to a 4-Day Workweek, Megan @ Axios
00:42:30 -  Speaking of work/life balance…
00:49:50 - Ubi’s New CCO, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:54:38 - Luna News, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:58:00 - Mario 64 LEGO Block
01:00:50 - Out today
01:05:51 - Squad Up:KBABZ(PS5) - KBABZ
01:06:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
